snippet.title: CREEPING CLARK DEMO - OFFICIAL GAMEPLAY TRAILER
snippet.description:
After escaping her abusive brother, Sophie seeks a fresh start in a remote house in Hawthorn's forest. But strange events unfold, and her unsettling housemate, Elise, may be hiding something. Is it just her anxiety, or is there something more sinister lurking in the shadows?

Download the demo here:
https://nerogamedev.itch.io/creeping-clark-demo
Wishlist the full game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3309240/Creeping_Clark/

Music used in the trailer:
Piano loops 037 by josefpres
Mysterious Music Box by Universfield
